remarks: The set of closed subspaces of a pre-Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cssval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
cssval.c $e |- C = ( CSubSp ` W ) $.
cssval $p |- ( W e. X -> C = { s | s = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` s ) ) } ) $.
$d ._|_ s $.
$d W s $.
